title: Five Years
alt: 'Well, no further questions. You're hired!' 'Oh, sorry! I'm no longer interested. There's a bunch of future I gotta go check out!'
transcript:
[Hairbun and Beret Guy sit across from each other at a desk. The woman has a bun.]
Hairbun : Where do you see yourself in five years? 
Beret Guy: Oh man, I don't know! Let's find out!
[The characters stare at one another.]
[Cobwebs and hair grow; the desk and chairs fall into disrepair.]
[Five years pass.]
Beret Guy: Hah—
Beret Guy: I thought so!
